metadata.product_category: Non-Linked Non-Participating Individual Pure Risk Life Insurance Plan

sum_assured.max: No Limit (Subject to Board Approved Underwriting Policy)
sum_assured.notes: Maternity Cover Sum Assured range: INR 2 Lakhs to 10 Lakhs

plan_variants.description: Base Sum Assured chosen at inception remains level throughout the term. Guaranteed Death Benefit payable on death.
Returns 50% of total premiums at specific age (Age 60 or Entry Age + PPT + 10). Life cover continues with 50% of Base SA. Remaining 50% premiums returned on maturity.
Enhanced Life Cover: 150% of Base Sum Assured payable if death occurs within first 15 policy years. 100% of Base Sum Assured payable thereafter.
Life cover throughout the term. 100% of Total Premiums Paid returned on survival till maturity.
Coverage till age 100. Returns 50% premiums at specific milestone age (Age 60 or Entry Age + PPT + 10). Remaining 50% returned at age 100.
Death Benefit paid as monthly income for a fixed period (minimum 10 years). Options: Level Income or Inflation Proof Income (increasing by 10% every 3 years).

core_benefits.death_benefit: Higher of: (a) Absolute Amount Assured to be paid on Death, (b) 105% of Total Premiums Paid, (c) 10 times Annualized Premium (for Non-Single Pay) or 1.25 times Single Premium.
core_benefits.maturity_benefit: Available only for Return of Premium, Early ROP Plus, and Whole Life variants. Returns Total Premiums Paid (excluding taxes/rider premiums).
core_benefits.terminal_illness_benefit: Accelerated benefit: 100% of Guaranteed Death Benefit (up to INR 1 Crore) paid immediately on diagnosis. Future premiums waived for base policy.
core_benefits.insta_payment_claim: Accelerated claim payout up to INR 2 Lakhs (depending on SA) paid within 1 working day from claim registration.

cover_continuance_benefit.description: Option to defer premium payment for up to 12 months while maintaining full risk cover.
cover_continuance_benefit.availability: After completion of 3 policy years. Available multiple times with a 5-year gap.

special_exit_value.description: Option to surrender policy and receive Total Premiums Paid back at no cost.
special_exit_value.timing: Available starting 30th policy year, but not during the last 4 policy years (for policy term >= 40 years).

female_lives_benefits.lifeline_plus: Option for female life insured to avail Top-up SA upon death of spouse.
female_lives_benefits.maternity_cover: Optional rider covering Pregnancy Complications and Congenital Anomalies (Payout up to 50% of Maternity SA).
female_lives_benefits.female_life_discount: Flat 15% discount on premium rates compared to male rates.

special_features.voluntary_top_up: Option to increase Sum Assured via Top-Up premiums (Minimum INR 5000) during policy term.

riders: Axis Max Life Critical Illness and Disability Rider (UIN: 104B033V02)
Axis Max Life Waiver of Premium Plus Rider (UIN: 104B029V05)
Axis Max Life Accidental Death and Dismemberment Rider (UIN: 104B027V05)

discounts.salaried_discount: First Year Discount of 15% (2% for Single Pay).
discounts.existing_customer_discount: First Year Discount of 15% (2% for Single Pay).
discounts.high_sum_assured: Premium rates decrease for higher Sum Assured bands.

exclusions.suicide_clause: In case of death due to suicide within 12 months of risk commencement/revival, beneficiary receives higher of Surrender Value or Total Premiums Paid.

metadata.product_category: Non-Linked, Non-Participating, Individual Pure Risk Premium/Savings

plan_variants.name: Life Protect
plan_variants.description: Lump sum payout on death.

plan_variants.name: Life & CI Rebalance
plan_variants.description: Balances Death and Critical Illness benefits. CI cover increases at each anniversary with a corresponding reduction in Life Cover. Total SA remains constant.

plan_variants.name: Income Plus
plan_variants.description: Provides life cover for the term and a lump sum payout on maturity along with regular income starting from age 60.

core_benefits.death_benefit: Highest of: Sum Assured, 10 times Annualized Premium, or 105% of Total Premiums Paid.
core_benefits.income_payouts: Monthly income of 0.1% of Basic Sum Assured paid in arrears from age 60 until death or maturity (Income Plus Option).

special_features.return_of_premium: Option to get 100% of Total Premiums Paid on maturity (available with Life Protect and Income Plus options).
special_features.accidental_death_benefit: Additional Sum Assured payable on accidental death.
special_features.auto_balance_ci: Unique feature under Life & CI Rebalance option where premiums are waived upon diagnosis of critical illness and life cover continues.

plan_variants.name: Life
plan_variants.description: Death Benefit only.

plan_variants.name: Life Plus
plan_variants.description: Death Benefit + Accidental Death Benefit (ADB Sum Assured is set at inception).

plan_variants.name: Life Rebalancing
plan_variants.description: Death Benefit + Accidental Death Benefit. Sum Assured and ADB SA vary by policy year. ADB drops to 0% after 10th year.

core_benefits.death_benefit: Highest of: Sum Assured on Death, 105% of Total Premiums Paid, 7 times Annualized Premium.
core_benefits.smart_exit_benefit: Option to cancel policy and receive Total Premiums Paid (exercisable after 25th policy year, not in last 5 years).

special_features.premium_break: Option to skip premium payment for 12 months.
special_features.insta_payment: Accelerated Death Benefit of â‚¹3,00,000 on claim intimation within 1 working day.

metadata.product_category: Non-Linked, Non-Participating, Individual Life Insurance Term Plan

plan_variants.name: Life Shield Plus
plan_variants.benefits: Death Benefit + Terminal Illness + Accidental Death Benefit + Waiver of Premium on ATPD.

plan_variants.name: Life Shield ROP
plan_variants.benefits: Death Benefit + Terminal Illness + Waiver of Premium + Return of Premium on Maturity.

special_features.early_exit_value: Available for Life Shield & Life Shield Plus variants to surrender policy and get premiums back after age 60.
special_features.health_management: Medical second opinion and consultation services.

plan_variants.name: Pure Protection Option
plan_variants.description: Large cover, low cost. Death benefit is paid to beneficiary.

plan_variants.name: Return of Premium on Maturity Option
plan_variants.description: Return of 100% of total premiums paid on survival till maturity.

special_features.death_benefit_payout: Guaranteed Death Benefit is highest of SA, 10x Annual Premium, or 105% of premiums paid.
special_features.women_discount: Premium for female is equal to that of a male 3 years younger.

metadata.product_category: Non-Linked, Non-Participating, Individual Pure Risk Premium

sum_assured.max: No Limit (Subject to Board Approved Underwriting Policy)

plan_variants.name: Level Cover Benefit
plan_variants.description: Sum Assured remains constant throughout the policy term.

plan_variants.name: Increasing Cover Benefit
plan_variants.description: Sum Assured automatically increases by 5% (simple rate) every year starting from the first policy anniversary, up to a maximum of 200% of original Sum Assured. Increases stop at age 71.

plan_variants.name: Level Cover with Future Proofing Benefit
plan_variants.description: Option to increase Sum Assured at specific life stages (Marriage, Birth of children, Purchase of house) without medical underwriting.

special_features.better_half_benefit: Ensures spouse automatically gets a life cover in case of life assured's death. 50% of Sum Assured or Rs 50 Lakhs (whichever lower). Future premiums waived.
special_features.premium_holiday: Option to skip premiums for 1, 2, or 3 years during the policy term.
special_features.terminal_illness_benefit: Accelerated death benefit where 100% of SA is paid on diagnosis.
special_features.discounts: Special rates for women, non-tobacco users, and salaried individuals.

metadata.product_category: Unit Linked Non-Participating Individual Life Savings

policy_term.note: Years or 99 minus age at entry

plan_options.name: Level Cover
plan_options.details: Highest of Sum Assured or Fund Value or 105% Premiums.

plan_options.name: Level Cover with Capital Guarantee
plan_options.details: Offers Minimum Assured Benefit on Maturity.

plan_options.name: Decreasing Cover
plan_options.details: Cover reduces after Level Cover Period.

investment.funds: Choice of 13 funds including Midcap Momentum, Nifty Alpha, etc.

core_benefits.death_benefit: Highest of Sum Assured, Fund Value, or 105% of Total Premiums Paid.

features.premium_waiver: Available on top of base plan.

plan_variants.name: Life Goal Option
plan_variants.benefit: Sum Assured varies with policy year based on level cover period and amortization rate.

special_features.smart_exit: Cancel policy between age 60 and maturity (if not in last 5 years) and get Total Premiums Paid back.
special_features.spouse_cover: Available to add spouse to the policy.
special_features.instalment_payout: Receive 100% of death benefit as income for 5-15 years.

metadata.product_category: Non-Linked, Non-Participating, Life Insurance Savings Product

core_benefits.death_benefit: Higher of: Basic Sum Assured, 11 times Annualised Premium, or 105% of Total Premiums Paid.
core_benefits.maturity_benefit: 100% of Total Premiums Paid returned on survival to end of policy term.

key_features: Policy term options strictly 10, 15, or 30 years
High Sum Assured rebate for coverage over specific limits

metadata.product_category: Non-Linked, Non-Participating, Life Insurance Savings Product

core_benefits.death_benefit: Higher of: Basic Sum Assured, 11 times Annualised Premium, or 105% of Total Premiums Paid.
core_benefits.maturity_benefit: 100% of Total Premiums Paid returned on survival to end of policy term.

key_features: Simple issuance for Sum Assured between 25 Lakhs to 50 Lakhs

sum_assured.max: No Limit (Subject to Board Approved Underwriting Policy)

plan_variants.name: Level Cover
plan_variants.description: Standard life cover where Sum Assured remains constant.

plan_variants.name: Increasing Life Cover
plan_variants.description: Auto increase SA by 25% or 50% at 5th and 10th policy year.

core_benefits.death_benefit: Highest of: Absolute Amount Assured, 105% of Total Premiums Paid, or 1.25x Single Premium/11x Annualized Premium.

special_features.smart_exit: Option to exit between age 60-65 and receive Total Premiums Paid back.
special_features.spouse_cover: Option to extend life cover to spouse.
special_features.life_stage_benefit: Increase SA on marriage, childbirth, or house purchase.
special_features.limited_pay_option: Convert Regular Pay to Limited Pay during policy term.

maturity_age.note: Max 75 years for Life Plus Option

plan_variants.name: Life Option
plan_variants.description: 100% Death Benefit paid on death.

plan_variants.name: Life Plus Option
plan_variants.description: Death Benefit + Accidental Death Benefit (up to 1 Crore).

plan_variants.name: Life Secure Option
plan_variants.description: Death Benefit + Waiver of Premium on Total & Permanent Disability.

special_features.step_up_option: Increase Sum Assured on Marriage or Childbirth.
special_features.step_down_option: Option to decrease Sum Assured in later years.
payout_options: Level Recurring Payout (6% of SA annually for 15 years)
Increasing Recurring Payout (starts at 6% of SA, increases by 10% p.a simple)
special_features.inbuilt_wellness: Access to health & wellness management services.

features.description: This is a combination solution comprising ICICI Pru iProtect Smart (Term) and ICICI Pru Guaranteed Income For Tomorrow (Savings).
features.how_it_works: Life Insurance Benefit from iProtect Smart + Guaranteed Savings from GIFT plan to mimic Return of Premium.

options.name: Return of Premium as Lumpsum
options.detail: Guaranteed lump sum benefit at least equal to total premiums paid.

options.name: Return of Premium as Regular Income
options.detail: Guaranteed income for 5, 7, or 10 years, totaling at least the premiums paid.

core_benefits.death_benefit: Sum Assured from term plan + Death Benefit from savings plan.
core_benefits.maturity_benefit: Guaranteed savings payout (effectively the return of premium).

variants.name: Option 1: Life Cover
variants.description: Standard death benefit on death of life assured.

key_features.claim_service_guarantee: Claim decision within 2 working days for eligible policies.

variants.name: Life Shield Plus
variants.coverage: Death Benefit + Terminal Illness + Accidental Death Benefit + Waiver of Premium (on ATPD/TI)

variants.name: Life Shield ROP
variants.coverage: Death Benefit + Terminal Illness + Waiver of Premium + Return of Premium on Maturity

special_features.premium_holiday: Option to skip premiums for 1, 2, or 3 years during the policy term.
special_features.early_exit_value: Available for Life Shield & Life Shield Plus variants to surrender and get premiums back after Age 60.
special_features.life_stage_upgrade: Increase SA on marriage, 1st child, 2nd child, or home loan.

plan_variants.name: 3D-Family Plus
plan_variants.benefits: Lump sum on Death + Regular Monthly Payouts for 10 years (amount increasing by 8% p.a.).

plan_variants.name: 3D-Accelerated
plan_variants.benefits: Death Benefit + accelerated Terminal Illness benefit (50% of Base SA).

plan_variants.name: 3D-TROP
plan_variants.benefits: Death Benefit + Return of Premium on Maturity.

key_features.3d_protection: Protects against Death, Disease, and Disability.
key_features.payout_options: Special monthly payout increasing annually for Family Plus option.

key_features.return_of_charges: Return of Premium Allocation Charge (15th year) & Mortality Charges (milestone based).
key_features.fund_maintenance_booster: Additional units added if fund value falls below one annualized premium after 4th year.
key_features.loyalty_additions: Added at 10th, 20th, 30th, 40th years (percentage of fund value).
key_features.family_benefit: Additional 1% Loyalty Benefit if family member is an existing policyholder.
key_features.investment_funds: Multiple funds including Equity Growth Fund II, Pure Stock Fund, etc.

metadata.uin: Combination of 110L179V02 (Smart Sampoorna Raksha Supreme) and 110N183V01 (Health Buddy)
metadata.product_category: Unit Linked Life Insurance Savings Plan (Combination)

maturity_age.note: Life Cover goes up to 100 years, ADB and ATPD cover up to 85 years.

policy_terms: Subject to max age at maturity

sum_assured.max: No Limit (Life Cover), 5 Crore (ADB and ATPD)

unique_features: Maturity Benefit includes Loyalty Additions and Fund Value
Includes Tata AIA Health Buddy Plan
Accidental Death and Total Permanent Disability covers inbuilt or optional depending on config

sum_assured.max: No Limit (Subject to Board Approved Policy)

variants.name: Life Promise
variants.description: Pure risk cover, Sum Assured paid on death

variants.name: Joint Life Promise
variants.description: Cover for spouse (First Life and Second Life)

variants.name: Joint Life Promise Plus
variants.description: Joint life with Return of Premium

core_benefits.death_benefit: Highest of 1.25x Single Premium OR 105% of Total Premiums Paid OR Absolute Amount Assured
core_benefits.terminal_illness: Accelerated benefit of 50% of Effective SA paid immediately; future premiums waived.
core_benefits.instant_payout: INR 3 Lakhs accelerated instant payout within 1 working day upon claim intimation (after 3 years waiting period).

special_features.flexi_pay_benefit: Option to defer premiums by up to 12 months.
special_features.payor_accelerator_benefit: 50% of SA advanced on Terminal Illness diagnosis.
special_features.women_benefit: Premium holiday due to pregnancy (defer premium for 12 months).

variants.name: Level Cover
variants.description: Sum Assured remains constant throughout the term

variants.name: Increasing Cover
variants.description: Sum Assured increases by 10% simple rate at end of every 5th year

core_benefits.death_benefit: Highest of: Absolute Amount Assured, 11x Annualized Premium, or 105% of Total Premiums Paid.
core_benefits.terminal_illness_benefit: Not specifically highlighted as an accelerated benefit in this specific summary (Focus is on High SA of 2 Crore+).

variants.name: Increasing Sum Assured
variants.description: SA constant for 5 years, then increases by 10% yearly till 15th year (max 2x Basic SA).

special_features.death_benefit_instalments: Option to receive death benefit in 5/10/15 year installments.

core_benefits.death_benefit: Highest of Sum Assured, Fund Value, or Minimum Death Benefit (105% premiums).

metadata.product_category: Non-Linked, Non-Participating, Individual Pure Risk Premium Life Insurance Plan
metadata.marketing_tagline: A life cover that has flexibility to evolve with your growing needs

sum_assured.note: Maximum Sum Assured subject to Board approved underwriting policy. Min Sum Assured varies for POS (Point of Sale).

plan_variants.description: Provides guaranteed death benefit in case of death of Life Assured.
Life Cover plus Accidental Death Benefit.
plan_variants.death_benefit_structure: Death Benefit + Accidental Death Benefit Sum Assured

core_benefits.death_benefit_logic: Highest of: a) 105% of total premiums paid, b) 10 times Annualized Premium, c) Sum Assured on Death.
core_benefits.accelerated_terminal_illness_benefit: Inbuilt Optional Benefit: 100% of Death Benefit paid in lump sum on diagnosis; policy terminates thereafter.
core_benefits.accidental_death_benefit: Available as 'Option 2' or Inbuilt Optional Benefit B.1. Pays 100% of Sum Assured on Death.
core_benefits.disability_benefit: Inbuilt Optional Benefit B.2: Additional Accidental Total and Permanent Disability (ATPD) Benefit. Pays 100% of Sum Assured on Death.

payout_options: Combination of Lump sum and Fixed monthly payout
special_features.claim_service_guarantee: Claim Decision within 2 working days for eligible policies (in-force 3+ years, claim up to 1 Crore). Penalty interest payable if delayed.
special_features.early_termination_value: For Single Pay: 60% * Single Premium * (Outstanding Term/Policy Term). For Limited Pay (after 3 years): Same formula.
special_features.wellness_benefit: Includes Doctor on call, Wellness Coach, Lab Services, Pharmacy delivery, Vital monitoring, Medical Wallet, etc.

riders_available: No specific riders listed as separate products; coverage is modular via Inbuilt Optional Benefits (ADB, ATPD, TI).
discounts: Tax benefits under Income Tax Act
exclusions: Suicide within 12 months results in refund of 80% premiums or unexpired risk premium value.
Accidental Death exclusions: Self-inflicted injury, alcohol/drug abuse, participation in hazardous sports/aviation, war, criminal intent.
Wellness benefits subject to availability of service providers.

metadata.product_name: Smart Term with Additional Returns ULIP
metadata.product_category: Unit Linked Non-Participating Individual Life Insurance

variants.name: Life Secure Variant
variants.description: Lump sum death benefit with market-linked maturity benefit.

variants.name: 3D Life Secure Variant
variants.description: Lump sum death benefit, monthly income for 10 years, funding of future premiums and maturity fund value.

death_benefit.life_secure_variant: Higher of Sum Assured on Death, Fund Value, or 105% of Total Premiums Paid.

3d_life_secure_variant.lump_sum: Higher of Sum Assured or 105% of Total Premiums Paid.
3d_life_secure_variant.monthly_income: 20% of Annualised Premium paid monthly for 10 years.
3d_life_secure_variant.premium_funding: 1x, 2x or 3x of future outstanding premiums funded by insurer.

core_benefits.maturity_benefit: Fund Value calculated as number of units multiplied by NAV on maturity date.

policy_administration_charge.credit_timing: At maturity or age 85, whichever is earlier

guaranteed_loyalty_additions.whole_life_variant: From age (80 âˆ’ entry age + 1) to (85 âˆ’ entry age)

key_features.partial_withdrawals: Allowed after completion of 5 policy years

charges.mortality_charge: Based on Sum at Risk and attained age
charges.morbidity_charge: Applicable only for 3D Life Secure Variant

riders.name: Axis Max Life Critical Illness and Disability Secure Rider
Axis Max Life Smart Ultra Protect Rider

tax_benefits.section_80c: Premiums eligible as per prevailing tax laws
